articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: An Indian court sentences a man to life in prison for raping and murdering an Irish backpacker - ABC News
articles.description: A court in India’s western Goa state has sentenced a 31-year-old man to life in prison for raping and murdering an Irish woman at a popular tourist resort nearly eight years ago
articles.content:
NEW DELHI -- A court in India's western Goa state on Monday sentenced a 31-year-old man to life in prison for raping and murdering an Irish woman at a popular tourist resort nearly eight years ago.
